name: Rin-Tohsaka
description: A WhatsApp Bot written in JavaScript using Baileys.

NAME.description: Name of your bot ( i.e. Rin Tohsaka )

SESSION.description: A string for the session to be classified and to get access to the server endpoints ( Dont Forget / Should be unique )

MODS.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be mods/admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma "," i.e. 923xxxxxx, 91xxxxx)

MONGO_URI.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required) i.e: mongodb+srv://Ali:ariani@testicles.vzog1fk.mongodb.net/?retryWrites=true&w=majority
